# Data Prep

```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)

spotify_data <- c(
  "00s",
  "10s",
  "60s",
  "70s",
  "80s",
  "90s"
) %>%
  set_names() %>%
  map(~ read_csv(paste0("dataset-of-", .x, ".csv"),
    show_col_types = FALSE
  )) %>%
  bind_rows(.id = "decade") %>%
  select(-uri, -artist, -track)

spotify_data %>% colnames()
```
